insert into ledger_zhiye (serial_number, area, project_name, expect_invest, contract_amount, performance_amount, paid_amount, settled_account, remark, create_time, update_time) values (#{serialNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{area,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{expectInvest,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{contractAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{performanceAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{paidAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{settledAccount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update ledger_zhiye set serial_number = #{serialNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, area = #{area,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, project_name = #{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, expect_invest = #{expectInvest,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, contract_amount = #{contractAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, performance_amount = #{performanceAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, paid_amount = #{paidAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, settled_account = #{settledAccount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, serial_number, area, project_name, expect_invest, contract_amount, performance_amount, paid_amount, settled_account, remark, create_time, update_time from ledger_zhiye where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
